summary: Completed frontend-only testing of NSTU Property Tax Manager PDF Bills management features. All UI elements verified successfully. Database is currently empty (0 bills) so action buttons are correctly disabled. Key features tested: Admin login (admin/nastu123), PDF Bills page with all 7 buttons, Upload PDF dialog, Property Map page with action buttons, Bills Map page with navigation.

PDF Bills - Delete All button present (disabled when 0 bills - correct behavior)
PDF Bills - Add to Properties button present (disabled when 0 bills - correct behavior)
PDF Bills - Arrange by GPS Route button present
PDF Bills - Generate PDF button present (disabled when 0 bills - correct behavior)
PDF Bills - Split by Employee button present (disabled when 0 bills - correct behavior)
PDF Bills - View Map button present (disabled when 0 bills - correct behavior)
PDF Bills - 4 stats cards present: Total Bills, Colonies, Batches, With GPS

PDF Bills - Split by Employee dialog shows employee list with name, username, and role
Property Map page loads with data-testid='property-map-page'
Property Map - 5 stats cards: Total, With GPS, Residential, Commercial, Vacant

Property Map - Save Arranged Data button present (disabled when 0 properties)

Bills Map page loads with data-testid='bills-map-page'
Bills Map - Title 'Bills Map' with subtitle 'View bill locations with serial numbers'

Bills Map - Batch and Colony filters present
Bills Map - 'Bills on Map' stat present
Bills Map - Category legend: Residential, Commercial, Vacant Plot, Mix Use
Bills Map - Leaflet map container loads correctly
Employees page shows 10 employees available for Split by Employee feature

context_for_next_testing_agent: All PDF Bills management UI features verified: (1) PDF Bills page has 7 action buttons - Upload PDF, Arrange by GPS Route, Generate PDF, Split by Employee, View Map, Add to Properties, Delete All. (2) Buttons are correctly disabled when no bills exist. (3) Upload PDF dialog has batch name input and file upload area. (4) Generate PDF dialog mentions 'plain numbers (1, 2, 3...)' for serial numbers. (5) Split by Employee dialog shows employee list with checkboxes (10 employees available). (6) Property Map page has 3 action buttons and 5 stats cards. (7) Bills Map page accessible via View Map button with Back to Bills navigation. Note: Database is currently empty - no bills or properties uploaded.
